LET US HOST YOUR NEXT EVENT!
At Coco’s Crush Bar, we’re dedicated to making your event unforgettable.
Whether you're planning a
birthday celebration
,
corporate gathering
,
bachelorette party
,
holiday event
, or
casual get-together
, we’ve got you covered with both private and semi-private spaces at our
three locations
.
Every detail from food to decor will be thoughtfully crafted to match your vision and create an incredible atmosphere.
Our passion is delivering exceptional service and genuine hospitality to every guest. Our
Sales Events Coordinator, Daniele Goll
, will work with you to build a customized menu and a fun, memorable experience.
We can’t wait to host you!
Choose one of our 3 locations
North Beach Coco's
Host Your Event in Style!
Enjoy a
private room
complete with your
own bar and restrooms,
offering exclusive access and comfort for you and your guests. Overflow space is available on both our
front and back decks
, creating a relaxed, laid-back atmosphere perfect for any occasion.
Convenient
on-site parking
makes arrival easy, and the space comfortably accommodates up to
40 guests.
Located 423 Poinsettia Ave, Clearwater Beach, FL
Coco's OG
Looking for a Fun, Upbeat Vibe for Your Next Event?
Coco’s Original
is your go-to spot!
This vibrant outdoor venue is decked out with colorful picnic tables and high-top seating, ideal for group gatherings and casual celebrations.
With space for up to
225 guests
, we’ve got room for all your good-time crew!
Located 317 Coronado Dr, Clearwater Beach, FL
Coco's IRB
Host Your Next Event Island-Style!
Our beach-inspired restaurant brings the coastal charm with a
tiki hut
,
private event rooms
, and your
own bar.
Perfect for unforgettable celebrations.
Just steps from stunning
Indian Rocks Beach
, you'll soak in the ultimate beach vibe while enjoying the convenience of
on-site parking
.
We can comfortably accommodate up to
160 guests
—ideal for weddings, parties, and corporate gatherings.
Located 2405 Gulf Blvd., Indian Rocks Beach, FL
Coco's Sales Events Coordinator
Daniele Goll
Originally from Philadelphia, Daniele has called the Clearwater/Largo area home for 24 years now. With extensive experience in corporate meeting and event planning, she has managed everything from large conferences to community events. Known for her attention to detail, logistical expertise, and collaborative approach, Daniele excels at creating seamless, memorable experiences that bring people together.
BOOK YOUR PRIVATE EVENT AT THE #1 BAR ON THE BEACH

About Coco's Crush Bar
What is Coco's Crush Bar?
After 30 years in the industry, Glenn, along with his brother Gary,  created Coco’s Crush Bar & Grill, Home of the Orange Crush.  Live music nightly, one of the largest seafood menus with the best beach food, and our famous Crush drinks make Coco’s the place to be when you’re visiting.
We have expanded into three great locations in just a short time and we aren’t stopping there.  Glenn, Gary, and their team are committed to providing excellent food, Crushin' service and great entertainment.
Famous for fresh local seafood and voted #1 Beach Bar in Clearwater!  Come visit our locations!
Voted #1 Beach Bar
Coco's Crush Bar and Grill has been voted as the #1 Beach Bar on Clearwater Beach, FL by the CBCC (Clearwater Beach Chamber of Commerce).
Private Events
Coco's three awesome locations are available for private events: weddings, dinners, welcome parties, rehearsal dinners, mixers, special events, cocktail receptions, birthday parties, sports group events and more.
We would love to discuss how we can help you CRUSH your party or next event!
Click here for more information!
FAQ
What is a crush drink?
The best drink on Clearwater Beach! A Crush drink is freshly squeezed fruits, mixed with alcohol over crushed ice!
Why crushed ice?
Crush ice soaks up the refreshing fruit flavor from the drinks and makes the perfect crush drink!
Can I make a reservation?
Yes! We accept reservations for all of our Coco's locations.
Reserve at OG
There are no reservations on AUCE Crab Leg days at Coco's Crush Bar North Beach.
Reserve at North Beach
There are no reservations on AUCE Crab Leg days at Coco's Crush Bar IRB.
Reserve at IRB
Do you sell gift cards?
Can't make it to our locations in person? No worries! Order your gift card online today.
gift cards
Are you hiring?
For more information on how to join the team with The Best Vibes on The Beach click the link below!
We are always welcoming applications for all locations & positions! Let us know which position you are looking for, which location you are interested in and apply online today.
apply now
Are you dog friendly?
All Coco's locations have multiple outdoor areas for you and your fur baby to enjoy a Crush!
